answers.answer: I'm sorry you're having a hard time. Depression is not uncommon with diabetes. Could the rise in your A1C be connected to your depression? The short answer is yes, not directly, but indirectly because it's hard enough to manage diabetes when you feel well, but when you're depressed everything is more of a struggle. My opinion is first of all, don't beat up on yourself! Depression is an illness the same as diabetes and needs treatment. If the Paxil was no longer working, then your doctor should try you on a different medication. My suggestion (I worked in the field for many years) would be to see a Psychiatrist rather than just your medical doctor because they are a lot more experienced at working with people to get them on the right dose of the right medication. I also would strongly suggest getting into some type of therapy. Medication for depression is only one side of the picture, dealing with the issues involved is the other.And I want to say one more time: Don't beat up on yourself! (this tendency to be self-critical is part of the depression as well!)

Thank you for your help..I went back on my paxil and i am feeling so much better ..i read really bad things about paxil..but i guess if it helps me its ok to take it ..is a   a1c of 7.5 reall bad ..i was so bumbed out when i seen that my a1c went from a 6.4 to a 7.5 ..Im trying really had for a better a1c next time

Good, I'm glad to hear you're doing better! I've heard a lot worse A1C's than 7.5! My guess is now that you're feeling better emotionally you should be able to get your numbers back down. The good thing about diabetes is each day is a new opportunity to have good numbers!
thank you so much your encouragement helps alot..do you have any input on paxil at all

question: I found out i was a diabetic in 07  and my dr had me on Pixal for hot flashes ..about 1 1/2 months ago i went off the paxil cuz it didnt really seem to be working...i just had my a1c test and it came bakc 7.5 it was down to 6.4 ..i have been doing alot of crying and really depressed sence going off the paxil ..does anyone thing the rise in the a1c could be form be so depressed ..i feel really bad was up this morning crying at 4:00am and im scared isnt 7.5  a bad number
title: very depressed
